dataType.title: data type
dataType.description: value should be GPBoolean, GPDouble, GPLong, GPString, GPDate, GPLinearUnit, GPFeatureRecordSetLayer, GPRecordSet, GPDataFile, GPRasterData, GPRasterDataLayer, or GPMultiValue:GPString

value.title: value
value.description: the value of the parameter; the type depends on the dataType
